ctx: intros n ln t1 l1 l2 H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros n ln t1 l1 l2 H1 H2. destruct H1 as [H1a [H1b H1c]]. apply subst_pred_length in H1c. rewrite <- H1b in H2. apply ordered_cover_subst_pred in H1a as [t2 [H2a H2b]]. exists t2. split. - apply H2a. - apply H2b.
